column4: Gnome works nice for screenshots, just hit printscreen button
I need something that will scroll the window in the browser though as it's making the screenshot that way I can get a screenshot of a long webpage for example
donno of any thing like that for anything Microsoft Windows,  Mac,  or Linux so you know more than me which is no big deal ha!
lol ok that works... guess I'll have to keep looking around. Windows has got a few great ones but I need one for Linux for some of my work requirements
